errors.english: I'm looking forward to helping you
errors.description: Spanish uses wrong reflexive pronoun 'ayudarme' (help me) instead of 'ayudarte' (help you)
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm looking forward to helping you

errors.english: I'm going to help you as soon as I can
errors.spanish: voy a ayudarme tan pronto como pueda
errors.description: Spanish uses wrong pronoun 'ayudarme' (help me) instead of 'ayudarte' (help you)
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm going to help you as soon as I can
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: voy a ayudarte tan pronto como pueda

errors.english: I wanted to help
errors.description: Spanish 'ayudarme' means 'to help myself', but English says 'to help' (no object). Should be just 'ayudar' or specify who to help
errors.suggested_fix_english: I wanted to help

errors.english: I was going to ask you
errors.description: English uses past tense 'was going to' but Spanish uses present 'voy a' (am going to). Should be 'iba a preguntarte'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I was going to ask you

errors.english: I wanted to help you yesterday
errors.description: Spanish uses wrong pronoun 'ayudarme' (help me) instead of 'ayudarte' (help you)
errors.suggested_fix_english: I wanted to help you yesterday

errors.english: you wanted to ask me
errors.description: Spanish uses wrong pronoun 'preguntarte' (ask yourself) instead of 'preguntarme' (ask me)
errors.suggested_fix_english: you wanted to ask me

errors.english: you wanted with me
errors.description: English phrase is grammatically incomplete - 'wanted' requires an infinitive verb or object
errors.suggested_fix_english: you wanted something with me

errors.english: I want to speak with me
errors.description: Semantic error: 'I want to speak with me' doesn't make logical sense - one cannot speak with oneself in this context
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to speak with myself

errors.english: I like speaking with me
errors.description: Semantic error: 'I like speaking with me' doesn't make logical sense
errors.suggested_fix_english: I like speaking with myself

errors.english: I'm looking forward to speaking with me
errors.description: Semantic error: 'I'm looking forward to speaking with me' doesn't make logical sense
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm looking forward to speaking with myself

errors.english: did you want to ask me
errors.description: Spanish uses wrong pronoun 'preguntarte' (ask yourself) instead of 'preguntarme' (ask me)
errors.suggested_fix_english: did you want to ask me

errors.english: I want to show me
errors.description: Semantic error: 'I want to show me' is illogical. The reflexive form 'mostrarme' would mean 'show myself' which doesn't match the English intent. Context suggests this should be 'show you'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to show you

errors.english: I'm going to show me
errors.description: Same semantic error - should be 'show you'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm going to show you

errors.english: I like to show me
errors.description: Same semantic error - should be 'show you' or clarify intent
errors.suggested_fix_english: I like to show you

errors.english: I'm looking forward to showing me
errors.description: Same semantic error - should be 'show you'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm looking forward to showing you

errors.english: I wanted to show me
errors.description: Same semantic error - should be 'show you'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I wanted to show you

errors.english: I'm going to be able to show me
errors.description: Same semantic error - should be 'show you'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm going to be able to show you

errors.english: I'm looking forward to showing me as soon as I can
errors.spanish: estoy deseando mostrarme tan pronto como pueda
errors.description: Same semantic error - should be 'show you'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm looking forward to showing you as soon as I can
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: estoy deseando mostrarte tan pronto como pueda

errors.english: I'm going to show me something
errors.description: Same semantic error - 'show me' should be 'show you'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm going to show you something

errors.english: I like Spanish
errors.description: Spanish requires the definite article with language names when used with 'gustar': should be 'me gusta el español'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I like Spanish

errors.english: he doesn't want when
errors.description: Both English and Spanish are grammatically incomplete - 'when' requires a clause to follow
errors.suggested_fix_english: he doesn't want it when
